Thaabiet Abrahams

Neat Ground Floor 1-Bedroom Apartment in Central Walmer Estate

This well-maintained 1-bedroom apartment is located in the heart of Walmer Estate, a central and accessible suburb just minutes from Cape Town’s CBD. Positioned on the ground floor at 91 Upper Duke Street, the unit features a spacious bedroom with built-in cupboards, an open-plan living area, a practical kitchen, and a tiled bathroom. It's ideal for first-time buyers, students, or young professionals looking for a lock-up-and-go lifestyle close to the city.

The apartment is conveniently situated near key amenities including UCT Medical Campus, CPUT, Pick n Pay Woodstock, Woodstock Exchange, and Garden Centre Mall. Commuters will benefit from easy access to the N2, M3, and MyCiTi bus routes, while nearby attractions such as the Old Biscuit Mill, De Waal Park, and Christiaan Barnard Hospital are all within a short drive. This is a prime opportunity to secure a...

This well-maintained 1-bedroom apartment is located in the heart of Walmer Estate, a central and accessible suburb just minutes from Cape Town’s CBD. Positioned on the ground floor at 91 Upper Duke Street, the unit features a spacious bedroom with built-in cupboards, an open-plan living area, a practical kitchen, and a tiled bathroom. It's ideal for first-time buyers, students, or young professionals looking for a lock-up-and-go lifestyle close to the city.

The apartment is conveniently situated near key amenities including UCT Medical Campus, CPUT, Pick n Pay Woodstock, Woodstock Exchange, and Garden Centre Mall. Commuters will benefit from easy access to the N2, M3, and MyCiTi bus routes, while nearby attractions such as the Old Biscuit Mill, De Waal Park, and Christiaan Barnard Hospital are all within a short drive. This is a prime opportunity to secure a centrally located property with great value and solid rental appeal
